item.title: Visualizing mental health data with ggplot2
item.description: Things I love include data visualization, tutorials, and fighting mental illness stigma. This post combines them all! I made a pretty neat layout with plots and a map of my Location History a while back, and here I’ll walk through some of the data cleaning process and custom styling. Export and download app data I use eMoods to track my mental health from day to day. I’m a superfan of this app.
